rag_ready_data.title: 工業技術研究院 - 介紹
rag_ready_data.content:
工研院是台灣最大的產業技術研發機構，也是開創台灣半導體產業的先鋒[2]。
1969年底，甫接任經濟部長的孫運璿應邀訪韓，在參觀韓國首爾的科技研究院時，對於韓國政府為發展科技產業，給予科技人才優厚待遇和彈性法規的作法印象深刻，返國後立刻著手推動類似機構。[3]
1973年時，任經濟部長孫運璿推動聯合工業研究所、聯合礦業研究所、金屬工業研究所合併成立工業技術研究院，並給予工研院以先進工業技術推動台灣工業發展和經濟起飛的目標。
1975年，RCA獲選為台灣積體電路合作計畫的夥伴，1976年，第一批赴美受訓的工程師整裝待發，1977年，工研院建立台灣首座4吋晶圓的積體電路示範工廠，並自1980年起，陸續衍生了包括聯電、台積電、台灣光罩、世界先進等半導體大廠，奠定了台灣IC產業起飛；1983年工研院更開發出與IBM相容的個人電腦，並將技術移轉給國內業者，帶動週邊產業的蓬勃發展，奠定了個人電腦資訊產業的基礎。
工研院運用了研發環境的獨特性，以及透過綿密堅實的產業網絡關係，連結區域或產業之研發能量，積極協助台灣產業發展與升級。2005年起，為配合台灣整體區域產業發展政策，強化科技與地方產業的連結，陸續在台南六甲設立「南分院」、南投設立「中分院」，深耕台灣產業創新的研發專區。

rag_ready_data.title: 工業技術研究院 - 沿革
rag_ready_data.content: 1973年，時任經濟部長孫運璿，推動將經濟部所屬的聯合工業研究所、聯合礦業研究所、金屬工業研究所合併，成立財團法人工業技術研究院。1976年，與美國無線電公司（RCA）簽訂技術移轉授權合約，成功引進半導體製程技術。1980年，衍生成立聯華電子，為國內第一家專業4吋晶圓製造公司。1985年，研發碳纖維複合材料，技轉自行車、高爾夫球及網球拍廠商，其中技轉廠商之一的巨大機械已發展成為全球最大自行車廠。1987年，衍生國內第一家六吋晶圓製造廠「台灣積體電路製造公司」，開創全球第一個晶圓代工製造營運模式。機械領域1989年，衍生設立「盟立自動化股份有限公司（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館）」，為國內最具規模的整合性工業自動化公司[4]。1990年，召集國內46家廠商成立「筆記型電腦聯盟」，建立產業分工體系，促使台灣日後成為全球最大的筆記型電腦生產國。1993年，衍生成立「世界先進積體電路公司（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館）」，是國內第一家八吋晶圓製造公司，使台灣晉升為世界半導體主流國之一。1995年，執行「共用引擎計畫」，自英國蓮花汽車技術移轉，開發台灣第一部量產之1.2升8閥及16閥汽車共用引擎，並促成華擎機械之成立。1996年，成立開放實驗室，加速產業技術開發及開創新興高科技產業。2002年，完成台灣第一座符合國際水準之多功能cGMP中草藥試驗工廠建廠。2005年，獲亞洲育成協會（AABI,Asian Associatin og Business Incubation）「亞洲最佳育成中心」（AABI Award）獨家榮銜。在台南縣六甲鄉成立「南分院」，將工研院研發能量延伸至南台灣。2007年，啟用全國首座軟性電子量產開發實驗室，此為領先全球具量產開發技術能量的開放合作實驗室，加速國內軟性電子產業的發展。2008年，建置開發WiMAXForum認可的全球首座WiMAXForum應用實驗室（MTWAL），協助國內業者進行各種概念服務的驗證測試。2009年，建置台灣首座獲全球認證（IECEE）的太陽光電測試實驗室（IEC 61215 CBTL），成為全球唯一非會員國取得認證資格的國家。2010年1月，加入國際照明委員會（CIE），為國家級會員。3月，與美國UL合作，推動電動車電池模組暨充電系統安全認證技術標準。6月，打造亞洲首座三維立體積體電路（3D IC）研發實驗室。2011年1月，與德國Fraunhofer簽訂歐盟科研計畫協定（FP7 Grant Agreement）。7月，推動綠色低碳院區計畫Green Campus、成立社會公益委員會。9月，與日本九州大學合作，建立全國首座人因照明實驗室。11月，工研院創新公司（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館）（ITIC）與日本三菱日聯投資公司（MUCAP）成立台日創投基金。2012年3月，LED照明測試實驗室取得CBTL認證，為國內第一座符合IEC國際標準之LED照明測試實驗室、成立「商業化諮詢委員會」推動新創事業。2013年6月，於荷蘭恩多芬高科技園區[失效連結]成立工研院荷蘭辦公室、與台泥合作建立臺灣首座「鈣迴路補或二氧化碳先導型試驗廠」、成立「工研院科技新創俱樂部」，為台灣高科技產業營造創業氛圍。7月，工研院六甲院區「南部雷射光谷育成暨試量產工場」啟用。8月，成立工研院中分院，帶動中部產業發展。2014年1月，成立亞洲首座通過具國際公信力認證資格的功率模組測試實驗室。3月，全球首座正式營運的OCP開放運算計劃認證中心開幕。9月，工研院中分院與經濟部中台灣創新園區開幕。2015年4月，研發成果「可高速充電鋁離子電池」刊登於英國Nature期刊，為再生能源儲能產業注入創新能量。5月，成立「工研新創群英會」平台，匯聚創業家CEO的成功創業經驗，培育更多新的年經創業家。6月，於美國矽谷成立「台灣創新創業中心」串聯國際新創產業鏈。12月，工研院燃料電池認證實驗室獲得產品安全測試驗認證機構UL認證，為亞洲實驗室通過認證首例。2016年4月，與全球第二大漆包線塗料生產廠商－東特塗料株式會社（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館），簽訂電動車馬達散熱關鍵材料合作備忘錄，展開跨國高導熱絕緣樹脂技術合作。7月，與台泥公司進行碳捕獲及利用技術合作簽約儀式，協助廠商擴大建置微藻養殖示範系統及研發中心，進行微藻固碳及加值化應用。9月，與圖形處理器（GPU）加速運算技術大廠NVIDIA（輝達）簽署合作備忘錄，將深度學習、人工智慧導入自動駕駛車輛，及共同開發機器人智慧化。11月，成立巨量微組裝產業推動聯盟，串連顯示、LED、半導體及系統整合廠商，共同建立跨領域產業交流平台。2017年10月，率先進駐沙崙綠能科學城，與台塑共同打造染料敏化電池試量產線。11月，攜手俄羅斯國家科學院，擴大科研創新合作平台綜效。12月，創新園區正式揭牌啟用，以共創模式打造創新研發與產業化聚落。2018年7月，成立「電網管理與現代化策略辦公室」（推動電網管理技術和解決方案）、「循環經濟策略辦公室」（推動跨域整合型循環經濟產業創新研究）；與車王電子（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館）、華德動能、X-by-Wire新創公司iAuto及臺灣大學等合作，發表國內首部「自動駕駛中型巴士」及「自動駕駛商用車」。8月，成立「產業科技國際策略發展所」，提供台灣產官學研各界專業的市場資訊與顧問服務。10月，成立「人工智慧應用策略辦公室」，推動產業AI化與AI產業化。2019年2月，整合25家電力、電網及再生能源等領域的領導企業與學校，成立「電網人才發展聯盟」，力促臺灣能源轉型。8月，攜手臺灣中小企業銀行、中小企業信用保證基金三方合作，結合資金市場與科技市場，以無形資產評價獲取銀行優惠利息融資，開我國首創。10月，與新竹市政府合作，共同推動「Taiwan No. 0001」自駕車正式於新竹南寮漁港揭牌上路，成為全臺首輛能在開放場域驗證的自駕車。10月，工研院光電測試實驗室獲得權威 DiiA 聯盟認可，成為國內唯一取得 DALI（Digital Addressable Lighting Interface；DALI）認證殊榮之測試實驗室。12月，臺南沙崙智慧綠能科學城正式啟用。2020年2月，與工具機公會、精機中心、金工中心、紡織所等單位，共同協助廠商布建生產口罩之設備。6月，與台大生醫分院、新竹馬偕共同合作開發「正壓採檢亭」，具有安全設計、採檢量高、節能舒適、獨立潔淨、組裝迅速等五大特色。10月，與新思科技合作成立人工智慧晶片實驗室(AI Chip Design Lab)，加速臺灣AI晶片發展。11月，啟用「TBIC生醫產業跨域整合實驗場域」(Taiwan Integrated Biomedical Industrial Center)，以三大驗證實驗室與四大模擬臨床場域，為國內第一個智慧醫療跨域整合實驗場域，吸引國際知名生醫產業阿斯特捷利康(AstraZeneca; AZ)率先投入成立「未來醫療實驗室」。12月，「南部產業創新策略辦公室」正式揭牌，整合產官學研的創新計劃資源，推動南部產業發展。2021年3月，成立「淨零永續策略辦公室」，宣布全院將在2050年達到淨零排放的目標。10月，打造首座 MIT「細胞自動化生產系統」，為全球整合最完整的系統模組，也是國內首座結合細胞培養、品質檢測及收穫繼代等完整功能的自動化系統。11月，與新竹物流合作臺灣首創自駕物流，全長約1.9公里，為全臺第一個直接在開放性真實人車混合道路進行的自駕物流實驗測試案例；啟用「臺灣半導體與電子產業先進雷射應用服務中心」，引進來自德國創浦（Trumpf）的四台亞洲僅有高階脈衝雷射。2022年4月，舉辦ITRI NET ZERO DAY「打造淨零時代競爭力」論壇暨特展。5月，與中華民國全國工業總會、台灣區電機電子工業同業公會、臺灣機械工業同業公會、台灣化學產業協會、台灣電路板協會等關鍵公協會合作成立「淨零永續人才聯盟暨淨零永續學校」。6月，發表「臺灣2050氫應用發展技術藍圖」，從發電、載具、工業三大氫能應用與氫氣供應面向，結合產業需求與技術發展。11月，攜手台達電子、復盛公司、堃霖空調、漢鐘精機、寧茂企業、力菱機電、鑫國空調設備、中興電工、日揚科技、天基冷凍空調、東元電機、國祥冷凍機械、崴立機電等13家廠商，打造第一條全國產磁浮離心壓縮機與冰水機供應鏈。12月，與中鋼公司建立全臺首座「鋼化聯產」先導工場，將整合鋼鐵與化工產業碳資源循環利用。2023年5月，與桃園機場公司合作在桃園國際機場第一、二航廈及周圍重要站點間進行自駕運行，為臺灣第一個在開放場域以中高速自駕測試運行案。6月，工研院光復院區二館榮獲內政部頒訂綠建築標章。7月，建立「史料文物館」收藏國內近50年來的科技產業發展文物，包含七大產業領域、逾百件珍貴研發成果，如1976年臺灣第一顆自行設計的商用積體電路、1983年臺灣第一具工業機器人ITRI-E、1996年全球第一片2L軟性印刷電路板等。8月，攜手台積電力邀逾30家廠商制定半導體設備資安標準，歷時3年於2022年正式發布SEMI E187半導體設備資安標準，成為少數由臺灣主導制定的國際標準，並於2023年獲頒「SEMI 2023 國際標準貢獻獎（2023 International SEMI Standards Excellence Award）」。12月，再次獲得美國食品藥物管理局（U.S. Food and Drug Administration；FDA）查驗資格，審查項目增加至184項，迄今工研院仍是美國以外唯一的第三方醫療器材上市審查機構。

rag_ready_data.title: 工業技術研究院 - 爭議
rag_ready_data.content:
2025年4月，工業技術研究院（工研院）於執行衛生福利部「次世代數位醫療平臺（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館）」計畫期間，因未依規定標註開源專案授權內容，且於另一國家標準專案「TW Core IG」的授權條款中明文禁止特定個人與公司使用該專案，引發開源社群廣泛關注與爭議。[5]2025年4月16日，一名工程師（下稱「當事工程師」）於 GitHub 專案ITRI-BDL-D/CQL-Project-template（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館） 中新增 issue 討論[6]，指控工研院未遵守Apache-2.0 授權條款（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館），將美國 AHRQ 開源專案CQL-Testing-Framework（頁面存檔備份，存於網際網路檔案館） 程式碼複製後上傳至其管理的專案中，卻未附上原始授權聲明[7][8]。同日，工研院補上授權檔案，但仍未標註原作者等必要資訊，不符合授權條款要求[9]。2025年4月19日，工研院於TW Core IG專案中更新授權條款，明文禁止當事工程師及其公司使用該專案內容，引發外界質疑政府資源不應針對特定個人設限[10]。2025年4月19日，工研院更新授權條款，解除上述限制，聲明「我們已知當事工程師經過此次事件已了解其於其專案之 CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 許可證特別禁止工研院使用也是一件不好的事，故我們針對我們的專案的許可證取消對其限制。」[11]。2025年4月19日，當事工程師回應，指出其專案設定限制條款的原因，是因工研院「在未經同意、未經知會的狀況下，擅自將其專案納入醫資大平台，作為 KPI？」，並呼籲工研院應公開道歉[12]。2025年4月19日，衛福部資訊處發表聲明，感謝民眾對開源授權標示的提醒，該程式原本就可以從美國的網站公開取得 ，為了避免不需要的誤解，本部已經要求提供工具原網站連結為主；醫療資訊大平台所提供的各項數位工具與資源，在合理、正當的使用前提下，本部絕對不會設限或阻擋大家的應用[13][14]。2025年4月20日，工研院對授權標示不全公開致歉，表示將於一週內完成技術架構與文件指引的全面檢視，並強調未來將強化與開源社群合作，落實知識共享精神。然而，針對限制特定人士使用政府公共資源部分，則未提出具體說明[15][16]。

rag_ready_data.content:
In 1982, the new Materials Research Laboratories (MRL) was established under ITRI andOtto C.C. Linwas appointed Founding Director.
In 2002, ITRI partnered withApex Medicaland started the development ofrespiratory therapyproduct series. This was one of Apex Medical's first major collaborations.
In 2019, ITRI banned all smartphones and computers made by China'sHuaweifrom their internal network for security reasons.[6][7]China'sTaiwan Affairs Officereacted negatively to the decision with their spokesperson saying that the decision "jeopardizes the mainland and Taiwan's regular economic cooperation for political purposes".[8]
In summer 2025 ITRI ceased its involvement in theTaiwan Space Agency's 5G LEO communications satellite project saying that they had realized that satellites were outside of their area of expertise. ITRI was replaced by private firms.[9]

rag_ready_data.title: ITRI Virtual Museum - Scene 1
rag_ready_data.content:
工研院線上展示館 │ ITRI Virtual Showroom
Ecological Tree ─ Tree Trunk
●Temperature Regulation
─ Design concept: Trees can adjust the convection and circulation of hot and cold air to regulate temperature through shade reflection, blocking, and evapotranspiration.

─ Application scenario: A hot air outlet is set up on the skylight above the ecological tree, and the electricity generated by the SideLighter is provided for the fan on the canopy to blow downward, resulting in air circulation.

─ Features and benefits: The six fans enable 7.7 cycles of air circulation per hour in the central elevated area (with a volume of 2,646 m3). One of the fans is solar-powered and each generates an air output of 57 m3/min.  

●Ambient Lighting
─ Design concept: In addition to environmental benefits, trees have the functions of sightseeing and landscaping for humans.

─ Application scenario: The ambient lighting created by light diffuser panels and LED lights sets off the shape of the ecological tree and adds aesthetic elements to the entire space. The indoor light can also adjust automatically in response to changes in sunlight.

─ Features and benefits:The diffuser panel has a light transmittance of 70% and a haze of 30%. The power consumption of the LED lamps is about 3,417 watts  - 23% of the amount generated by colored halogen lamps with the same luminous flux.
智慧醫療
智慧交通
Ecological Tree ─ Tree Root
●Water Purification
─ Design concept: The roots of trees can conserve water, and some aquatic plants can even decompose and purify water.

─ Application scenario: Qwater is a modularized water purification system that can be quickly assembled. The core technology is ITRI’s biomembrane filtration technology, an innovative water/wastewater treatment system that combines "(biological) filter bed area" and "membrane separation area."

─ Features and benefits: Qwater technology is particularly suitable for raw water or low-concentration sewage treatment. It can also be applied to domestic sewage, industrial wastewater, car wash wastewater, simple community/school tap water treatment and greywater reuse, etc.
Ecological Tree ─ Tree Top
●Solar Power Generation
─ Design concept: Photosynthesis, a mechanism by which plants use sunlight to produce carbohydrates, is used as the design concept to highlight the value of solar energy.

─ Application scenario: ITRI’s SideLighter technology is installed on the skylight above the ecological tree to demonstrate how solar-powered windows use sunlight to generate electricity.

─ Features and benefits: Each SideLighter panel in the size of 110*90 cm (about 1 square meter) generates a power of 18 watts. There are 20 pieces of SideLighter on the treetop, with the total power generation reaching approximately 360 watts. 

●Air Purification
─ Design concept: Trees can purify the air through the process of absorbing carbon dioxide and releasing oxygen during photosynthesis. In addition, the volatile substance phytoncides released by plants can also kill bacteria, pests and pathogens in the air.

─ Application scenario: The TiO2 nano-photocatalyst coated on the ecological tree canopy is used to kill airborne bacteria and decompose volatile organic compounds.

─ Features and benefits: When the fans in the canopy operate, the entire space can be ventilated through the photocatalyst coating area more than 7 times per hour, thus purifying the air. The antibacterial efficiency of the photocatalyst is up to 99.99%, and 1g of the nano-photocatalyst can decompose 20 µg of formaldehyde.

The CMC-100 Microcomputer
"ITRI carried out an industry development

生態樹 ─ 樹幹
● 生態樹的應用情境－調節溫度
─ 概念說明：樹木也具有調節溫度的功能，透過樹蔭反射/阻隔/蒸散等功能，可調節冷熱空氣的對流與循環。

─ 技術應用情境：於生態樹上方天窗架設熱氣排出口，再利用太陽能發電窗所產生的電力，驅動生態樹冠上的風扇向下吹送，造成空間氣流的循環效果。

─ 技術應用特色與效益：位於樹冠內的六台風扇全開（1台由太陽能供電/5台由市電供電，每台出風量每分鐘57立方米），於中央挑高區容積(2,646立方米)，每小時可以將空氣循環約7.7次。

● 生態樹的應用情境－情境照明
─ 概念說明：樹木除了具有環境循環與調節的功能外，對人類來說還具有觀賞與造景功能。

─ 技術應用情境：利用擴散光板與LED燈結合之情境照明，搭配生態樹本身的藝術造型，來營造整個空間美學的藝術內涵。此外擴散光板與LED燈也可隨時因應日照變化調節室內光線。

─ 技術應用特色與效益：
生態樹擴散光板示範效能穿透度光約70%，霧度約30%；LED燈的耗電量約3,417瓦，相對於同樣光通量之彩色鹵素燈約14,903瓦，其耗電量只有23%。
4-inch Silicon Wafer
United Microelectronics Corporation (UMC), one of ITRI's spinoffs, was the first 4-inch silicon wafer maker in Taiwan. This set a new paradigm in Taiwan's turn-key technology transfers.
6-inch Silicon 
Wafer
In 1986, the VLSI demonstration factory was inaugurated at ITRI's Building 67. The facility, known as Taiwan Semiconductor Fab 1 at that time, manufactured 6-inch silicon wafers.
生態樹 ─ 樹頂
● 生態樹的應用情境－光合作用
─ 概念說明：光合作用是植物利用陽光來製造能量(碳水化合物)的一種機制。

─ 技術應用情境：於生態樹上方天窗架設工研院研發之「太陽能發電窗」技術，用以展示太陽能發電窗利用陽光發電的情境。

─ 技術應用特色與效益：每片太陽能發電窗尺寸是110*90公分（約1平方米），發電量是18瓦；在生態樹示範面積內有20片，總發電量約360瓦。

● 生態樹的應用情境－淨化空氣
─ 概念說明：樹木透過光合作用中吸收二氧化碳與排放氧氣的過程，可達到淨化空氣的效果，此外植物散發的揮發性物質「芬多精」也可殺死空氣中的細菌、害蟲以及病原菌。

─ 技術應用情境：利用生態樹冠上塗層的自然光觸媒技術，來達到抵抗空間病菌及分解有機揮發氣體(VOC)的效果。

─ 技術應用特色與效益：樹冠內隱藏風扇可每小時讓整個空間換氣7次以上，並吹過光觸媒塗層區，淨化空氣。光觸媒抗菌效能可達99.99%，1g奈米光觸媒可分解20微克有機揮發性氣體（甲醛）。

ITRI completed development of its ITRI-A robot for use in assembly lines of small components. This was Taiwan's first robot of its type, and the technology was transferred to local firms to boost automation of their production lines.
ITRI Headquaters in the 1980s
ITRI actively established industrial automation technology to assist Taiwan’s traditional industries in shifting from the labor-intensive production model to a technology-intensive one. The Institute successfully promoted the personal computer, optoelectronic, and mechanical automation industries by cultivating and transferring technologies and talents. The seeds of Taiwan's personal computer development were planted, making personal computers become the mainstream of information industry and driving the establishment and development of new industries.
Chung-Mou Chang
Chung-Mou Chang received his bachelor’s and master’s degrees in mechanical engineering from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Ph.D. degree in electrical engineering from Stanford University. Dr. Chang started his career at Sylvania Semiconductor, and served as Group Senior Vice-President at Texas Instrument, and as President & COO at General Instrument Corporation. He later founded Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC). 

In 1985, Dr. Chang was invited by then ITRI Chairman Hsien-Hsiu Hsu to return to Taiwan and serve as the third President of ITRI. During his term, Dr. Chang initiated many reforms. He employed an American management style and launched a hiring system to encourage ITRI to be constantly innovative and creative. In 1988, Dr. Chang served as ITRI’s third Chairman and continued supporting ITRI to apply research results to the industry. By bridging the gap between research and industry, ITRI secured its role as one of the world’s leading R&D institutions.
In 1986, ITRI set up the spinoff TSMC with Chang as its Chairman. In 2000, Dr. Chang was awarded the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) Robert N. Noyce Medal. In 2011, he received the IEEE Medal of Honor, and was named as one of the first ITRI Laureates in 2012.

He worked as a researcher and research director at DuPont. Later he returned to Taiwan and taught at National Tsing Hua University (NTHU) as a professor. Dr. Lin served as the Dean of the College of Engineering at NTHU in 1978, during which he launched collaboration projects between the university and industries. He also set up the Center for Materials Science and facilitated many large material technology collaboration research projects, establishing the foundation for Taiwan’s polymer science.
In 1983, Dr. Lin became the General Director of ITRI’s Materials Research Laboratories. He headed the six-year national industrial material technology project and was awarded the Excellent Research Result Award from the Ministry of Economic Affairs. In 1986, Dr. Lin was elected as the President of the Materials Research Society-Taiwan (MRS-T) and held the post for four years. During his term, MRS-T was evaluated as an “Outstanding Group” by the Ministry of the Interior. Dr. Lin also received the Chih-Hung Lu Memorial Award from MRS-T.
In 1988, Dr. Lin served as the fourth President of ITRI. He emphasized the R&D of advanced technology and expanded the connection with industries by providing industrial services. This assisted in the development of Taiwan’s high-tech industries and the upgrading of traditional small and medium-sized enterprises. Under his leadership, ITRI also transferred many technologies to companies, including integrated circuits, laptops, optoelectronic components, general automobile engines, and composite materials. This set the foundation for Taiwan’s technology-intensive industry. In 1994, Dr. Lin was the winner of the Tung-Ho Outstanding Research Award - Material Science Category.

ITRI developed lightweight and stiff carbon fiber composite materials to replace the use of steel or aluminum in bicycle frames. This helped Giant become the world's first maker of carbon fiber bikes.

All-in-One Thermal Sensing System
ITRI’s All-in-One Thermal Sensing System enables high-precision remote detection of vital signs and patient activities, meeting the demand for contactless smart healthcare in the post-pandemic world. Its AI-based ultra-resolution thermal image processing is privacy-preserving and can measure body temperature, heart rate and respiration rate for multiple subjects simultaneously. The system can also provide monitoring over bed-exits, falls, and prolonged sedentary time and will issue alerts via a mobile app when abnormality is detected. The compact design makes it an ideal tool for basic physiological assessment in clinics, wards, or homes, offering a cost-effective solution for telemedicine services.

Handheld Ultrasound System
The Handheld Ultrasound System includes a lightweight, portable scanner with a smart app, which allow physicians to perform ultrasound exams anywhere, anytime. This 64-channel system supports changeable transducers (linear 7.5MHz/convex 3.5MHz) and is able to process B-mode and color Doppler mode images. The system provides point-of-care ultrasonography for doctors to save critical time in emergency and intensive care. ●生態樹的應用情境－光合作用
─ 概念說明：光合作用是植物利用陽光來製造能量(碳水化合物)的一種機制。

─ 技術應用情境：於生態樹上方天窗架設工研院研發之「太陽能發電窗」技術，用以展示太陽能發電窗利用陽光發電的情境。

─ 技術應用特色與效益：每片太陽能發電窗尺寸是110*90公分（約1平方米），發電量是18瓦；在生態樹示範面積內有20片，總發電量約360瓦。

●生態樹的應用情境－淨化空氣
─ 概念說明：樹木透過光合作用中吸收二氧化碳與排放氧氣的過程，可達到淨化空氣的效果，此外植物散發的揮發性物質「芬多精」也可殺死空氣中的細菌、害蟲以及病原菌。

─ 技術應用情境：利用生態樹冠上塗層的自然光觸媒技術，來達到抵抗空間病菌及分解有機揮發氣體(VOC)的效果。

─ 技術應用特色與效益：樹冠內隱藏風扇可每小時讓整個空間換氣7次以上，並吹過光觸媒塗層區，淨化空氣。光觸媒抗菌效能可達99.99%，1g奈米光觸媒可分解20微克有機揮發性氣體（甲醛）。

智慧家庭
Medical Implants for Hard-Soft Tissue Injuries
It is recognized that medical uses for 3D printing technology, both actual and potential, will bring revolutionary changes. Application of 3D model reconstruction, customized design and additive layer manufacturing technologies to design and manufacture the bio-active medical devices, such as bone screw and implants. The bio-active implants with flexible and microstructure design could reduce the rigidity of the implant and increase bone growth. In addition, a new generation of artificial ligaments using 3D bioactive composite scaffolds for tissue engineering could also achieve enhanced cell attachment and osseointegration in soft-tissue reconstruction.
MetabColor
ITRI's MetabColor microbial dyes feature a non-toxic, eco-friendly, and renewable textile dye manufacturing process. The dyes have brilliant color strength & fastness required for textile industry. The bio-based dyes are available in five colors including the proprietary MetaColor Black, the world’s first black dye without mixing concentrated color dyes.
Software-defined Augmented Robot Joint  : (SARJ)
ITRI's patented SARJ presents a modern and unique stacking design that features integrated high-power-density electric drive modules. SARJ has the highest torque-to-volume ratio in the industry, with 40% less body weight in comparison to robots of the same grade. SARJ's plug-and-play design also allows users to quickly build up customized and flexible multi-joint modular robots. Nowadays, this technology is used in the high-tech and precision machinery industries, but it has potential to be immersed into business, home appliance and medical fields.

Ecological Tree ─ Tree Trunk
●Temperature Regulation
─ Design concept: Trees can adjust the convection and circulation of hot and cold air to regulate temperature through shade reflection, blocking, and evapotranspiration.

─ Application scenario: A hot air outlet is set up on the skylight above the ecological tree, and the electricity generated by the SideLighter is provided for the fan on the canopy to blow downward, resulting in air circulation.

─ Features and benefits: The six fans enable 7.7 cycles of air circulation per hour in the central elevated area (with a volume of 2,646 m3). One of the fans is solar-powered and each generates an air output of 57 m3/min.  

●Ambient Lighting
─ Design concept: In addition to environmental benefits, trees have the functions of sightseeing and landscaping for humans.

─ Application scenario: The ambient lighting created by light diffuser panels and LED lights sets off the shape of the ecological tree and adds aesthetic elements to the entire space. The indoor light can also adjust automatically in response to changes in sunlight.

─ Features and benefits:The diffuser panel has a light transmittance of 70% and a haze of 30%. The power consumption of the LED lamps is about 3,417 watts  - 23% of the amount generated by colored halogen lamps with the same luminous flux.
智慧醫療
智慧交通
Ecological Tree ─ Tree Root
●Water Purification
─ Design concept: The roots of trees can conserve water, and some aquatic plants can even decompose and purify water.

─ Application scenario: Qwater is a modularized water purification system that can be quickly assembled. The core technology is ITRI’s biomembrane filtration technology, an innovative water/wastewater treatment system that combines "(biological) filter bed area" and "membrane separation area."

─ Features and benefits: Qwater technology is particularly suitable for raw water or low-concentration sewage treatment. It can also be applied to domestic sewage, industrial wastewater, car wash wastewater, simple community/school tap water treatment and greywater reuse, etc.
Ecological Tree ─ Tree Top
●Solar Power Generation
─ Design concept: Photosynthesis, a mechanism by which plants use sunlight to produce carbohydrates, is used as the design concept to highlight the value of solar energy.

─ Application scenario: ITRI’s SideLighter technology is installed on the skylight above the ecological tree to demonstrate how solar-powered windows use sunlight to generate electricity.

─ Features and benefits: Each SideLighter panel in the size of 110*90 cm (about 1 square meter) generates a power of 18 watts. There are 20 pieces of SideLighter on the treetop, with the total power generation reaching approximately 360 watts. 

●Air Purification
─ Design concept: Trees can purify the air through the process of absorbing carbon dioxide and releasing oxygen during photosynthesis. In addition, the volatile substance phytoncides released by plants can also kill bacteria, pests and pathogens in the air.

─ Application scenario: The TiO2 nano-photocatalyst coated on the ecological tree canopy is used to kill airborne bacteria and decompose volatile organic compounds.

─ Features and benefits: When the fans in the canopy operate, the entire space can be ventilated through the photocatalyst coating area more than 7 times per hour, thus purifying the air. The antibacterial efficiency of the photocatalyst is up to 99.99%, and 1g of the nano-photocatalyst can decompose 20 µg of formaldehyde.

─ 技術應用情境：利用生態樹冠上塗層的自然光觸媒技術，來達到抵抗空間病菌及分解有機揮發氣體(VOC)的效果。
